notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: All data used in this paper are freely available and downloadable from the web. Species distribution maps were provided by the Amphibian and Mammal Red List Assessment ( http://www.iucnredlist.org/). For birds, breeding range distribution maps were extracted from BirdLife ( http://www.birdlife.org/). All climatic data are available on the CHELSA data portal ( http://chelsa-climate.org).
